name: Killing Floor 2D
description:
Killing Floor 2D Retro Remake

It's a Killing Floor like game what we made for JFO Jam III (RETRO REMAKE). This game was created in 1 week. 

Credits
  • Programming - XeroFox, Rumli
  • Design - Rumli, XeroFox
  • Music - Lil Bell
Game Engine
  • Game Maker Studio 2
